ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Has the story reached you of the legions
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Has the story of the hordes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Has the story of the armies reached you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you not heard about the stories of the armies
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did the story of the armies reach you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Has the story reached you of the hosts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Has not there come to you the story of the hosts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Hast thou received the story of the hosts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hath there come unto thee the story of the hosts
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you not heard the story of the hosts
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hath there come Unto thee the story of the hosts-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did you receive the story of the hosts
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Has the story reached thee, of the forces-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Has the story reached you of the hosts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Has it come to you the story of the hosts
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Has there come to you the story of the legions?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:17] Have you, O Muhammad (s), received the story of the hosts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Hath there come unto thee) Muhammad-He asked His Prophet about this because He did not inform him about it before and then He did-(the story of the hosts
